entities.name: XYZ Corp.
entities.description: XYZ Corp. is a multinational corporation involved in various business sectors, including technology, finance, and consulting. It has been recently investigated for fraudulent activities.

entities.name: John Doe
entities.description: John Doe is the CEO of XYZ Corp., facing charges of embezzling company funds. He has been in the spotlight for his alleged involvement in financial misconduct.

entities.name: Jane Smith
entities.description: Jane Smith is the CFO of XYZ Corp., accused of hiding financial records to avoid paying taxes. Her role in the company has made her a central figure in the ongoing investigation.
